wikipedia_page.main: Guy Lionel Greville Harry (19 December 1894 – 9 January 1979) was a British fencer. He competed at the 1928 and 1936 Summer Olympics.

response: * Oliver Trinder, Arthur Pilbrow, Guy Harry, Robin Brook, Roger Tredgold

response: * Edward Brookfield, Archie Corble, Alex Forrest, Guy Harry, Robin Jeffreys, Barry Notley
